title: IRevolveFeatureData2.AutoSelect
description: Gets or sets whether to automatically select all or only specific bodies for the revolve feature to affect in a multibody body.
returns: True to automatically select all bodies, false to select specific bodies for IRevolveFeatureData2::FeatureScopeBodies or IRevolveFeatureData2::ISetFeatureScopeBodies
remarks:
This property is only available when the
IRevolveFeatureData2::FeatureScope
property is true. The revolve feature is expanded along the plane on which the feature is created and selects all or only the specified bodies it intersects.
